title: Played Sylas on pbe. Riot, are you feeling okay?
body:
I'm prepared for downvotes for complaining about a champion before they're even released on live. I thought Neeko was actually decently well designed, and riot was going in a good direction with new champions _not_ being overloaded messes.

What the actual fuck is Sylas though?
Objective overview of his kit: 

Passive - AOE auto that deals 100% AD(+?AD (not sure if it's a ratio or a fixed amount per level))(+20% AP)

Q - long range controllable X shaped aoe with a 2 second, 35% slow. explodes after .5 seconds at the center of the X to increase that slow 50%. 
9/8/7/6/5 second CD  (5.4/4.8/4.2/3.6/3 with 40% CDR)
45/70/95/120/145 (+60% AP) (same damage on explosion)
Slow is 15/20/25/30/35% (+50% from explosion)

W - Medium range targeted dash that heals him, does bonus damage on enemies below 40%, and bonus healing if he's below 40%.
60/90/120/150/180 (+55% AP), 90/135/180/225/270 (+85% AP) on champions below 40%
Heals for:
50/100/150/200/250 (+40% AP), 100/200/300/400/500 (+80% AP) if he's below 40%
14/13.5/13/12.5/12  second CD (8.4/8.1/7.8/7.5/7.2 with 40% CDR)

E - short range dash that gives him a shield, followed by a long range gap closer with a .5 second knockup.
60/90/120/150/180 (+90% AP) shield
50/65/60/95/110 (+20% AP) gap closer
10s cooldown at all ranks (6s with 40% cdr)

R - Copy any champion's ult
85/50/15s CD (51/30/9s with 40% cdr)
Can't steal the same champion's ult twice for twice the length of their cd (modified by his cdr, minimum 20 seconds)

tl;dr: You gave him 3 dashes, a knockup, a slow, an empowered aoe auto after every abililty, a heal, a shield, and the ability to use enemy ults _every 9 seconds_ at max rank with the incredibly easy to get cdr cap?

######Ohwait.

He can Steal an Enemies Ultimate every 85/50/15 Seconds, but there's a cooldown on which champions he robs.
It takes the Cooldown of his Targets Ultimate & scales it up by 200%. the amount of time that totals up to is how long Sylas has to wait between robbing the same target. Granted, his own CDR can affect this effect's Cooldown, but only to a minimum of 20 Seconds.

For an Example, Karthus's Ultimate [R: Requiem] has a cooldown of 200/180/160 Seconds. If Sylas jacks Karthus's Requiem, Sylas will have to wait 400/360/320 Seconds before he can Steal Karthus's Ultimate again. This is assuming Karthus doesn't have any CDR ofcourse.
